div.p: TIME ON THE INTERNET. I SEE IT EVERY DAY.
ALL RIGHT. FINALLY TONIGHT THE FACTOR TIP
OF THE DAY, BECAUSE I CANNOT COOK, TODAY I SCREWED UP
TOAST, I SWEAR TO GOD I SCREWED IT UP.
I COULDN'T GET THE TOAST OUT OF THE TOASTER.
BECAUSE I CAN'T DO ANYTHING IN THE KITCHEN, I EAT IN
RESTAURANTS AND HAVE MY ENTIRE WORKING LIFE.
LISTEN UP, YOU CAN KEEP THE COST OF A HE MEAL IN A
RESTAURANT UNDER CONTROL BY THE FOLLOWING GUIDELINES.
AND DRINK WATER. ANY BEVERAGE YOU ORDER OUT
WILL COST WAY TOO MUCH. DON'T LET THEM GIVE YOU THE
BOTTLED WATER, DON'T LET THEM GIVE IT TO YOU.
NO DESSERT, ANOTHER OVERPRICED DEAL.
YOU HAVE DESSERT AT HOME. DO NOT.
IF THE POTATO AND VEGETABLES COST EXTRA WITH THE ENTREE,
YOU'RE GETTING STIFFED. PLENTY OF RESTAURANTS WILL
THROW THOSE IN. GO THERE.
AND FINALLY, DRINK A GLASS OF WATER WITH LEMON BEFORE YOU
ORDER. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY SAVING
YOU CASH. AND THAT'S IT FOR US TONIGHT.
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FACTOR NEWS WEBSITE DIFFERENT FROM
